inv_kin_calc_service.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import rospy
4 import numpy as np
5 from numpy.linalg import inv, det
6 from arm_us_msg.srv import InverseKinematicCalc, InverseKinematicCalcResponse
7 import math as m
8 from math import pi as PI
9 
10 def angle_deg(angle : float):
11  return angle * 180 / PI
12 
13 def angle_rad(angle : float):
14  return angle * PI / 180
15 
16 def handle_inv_kin_calc(req):
17 
18  resp = InverseKinematicCalcResponse()
19 
20  # Angles initiaux
21  q1 = angle_rad(req.angles[0])
22  q2 = angle_rad(req.angles[1])
23  q3 = angle_rad(req.angles[2])
24 
25  # Commande
26  command = np.array([req.commands[0], req.commands[1], req.commands[2]]).T
27 
28  if (command[0] == 0.0 and command[1] == 0.0 and command[2] == 0.0):
29  resp.velocities = [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]
30  resp.singularMatrix = 0
31  return resp
32 
33  rospy.loginfo("--------------------------------------------------")
34  rospy.loginfo("Angles: %f, %f, %f", q1, q2, q3)
35  rospy.loginfo("Commandes: {}".format(command))
36 
37  # Grandeurs physiques
38  J1x : float = 2.0548
39  J1y : float = 0
40  J1z : float = 0
41 
42  J2x : float = 0
43  J2y : float = -2.25
44  J2z : float = 0
45 
46  J3x : float = 0
47  J3y : float = 1.73
48  J3z : float = 0
49 
50  J4x : float = 0
51  J4y : float = 0.40
52  J4z : float = 0
53 
54  # Initialisation de la Jacobienne
55  x_q1 = J1z*m.cos(q1) + J2y*m.sin(q2)*m.cos(q1) + J4z*m.cos(q1)*m.cos(q2) - (J1x + J2x)*m.sin(q1) + (J2z + J3z)*m.cos(q1)*m.cos(q2) + (J3x + J4x)*(-m.sin(q1)*m.cos(q3) + m.sin(q2)*m.sin(q3)*m.cos(q1)) - (J3y + J4y)*(-m.sin(q1)*m.sin(q3) - m.sin(q2)*m.cos(q1)*m.cos(q3))
56  x_q2 = J2y*m.sin(q1)*m.cos(q2) - J4z*m.sin(q1)*m.sin(q2) - (J2z + J3z)*m.sin(q1)*m.sin(q2) + (J3x + J4x)*m.sin(q1)*m.sin(q3)*m.cos(q2) + (J3y + J4y)*m.sin(q1)*m.cos(q2)*m.cos(q3)
57  x_q3 = (J3x + J4x)*(m.sin(q1)*m.sin(q2)*m.cos(q3) - m.sin(q3)*m.cos(q1)) - (J3y + J4y)*(m.sin(q1)*m.sin(q2)*m.sin(q3) + m.cos(q1)*m.cos(q3))
58 
59  y_q1 = 0
60  y_q2 = -J2y*m.sin(q2) - J4z*m.cos(q2) - (J2z + J3z)*m.cos(q2) - (J3x + J4x)*m.sin(q2)*m.sin(q3) - (J3y + J4y)*m.sin(q2)*m.cos(q3)
61  y_q3 = (J3x + J4x)*m.cos(q2)*m.cos(q3) - (J3y + J4y)*m.sin(q3)*m.cos(q2)
62 
63  z_q1 = -J1z*m.sin(q1) - J2y*m.sin(q1)*m.sin(q2) - J4z*m.sin(q1)*m.cos(q2) - (J1x + J2x)*m.cos(q1) - (J2z + J3z)*m.sin(q1)*m.cos(q2) - (J3x + J4x)*(m.sin(q1)*m.sin(q2)*m.sin(q3) + m.cos(q1)*m.cos(q3)) + (J3y + J4y)*(-m.sin(q1)*m.sin(q2)*m.cos(q3) + m.sin(q3)*m.cos(q1))
64  z_q2 = J2y*m.cos(q1)*m.cos(q2) - J4z*m.sin(q2)*m.cos(q1) - (J2z + J3z)*m.sin(q2)*m.cos(q1) + (J3x + J4x)*m.sin(q3)*m.cos(q1)*m.cos(q2) + (J3y + J4y)*m.cos(q1)*m.cos(q2)*m.cos(q3)
65  z_q3 = -(J3x + J4x)*(-m.sin(q1)*m.sin(q3) - m.sin(q2)*m.cos(q1)*m.cos(q3)) + (J3y + J4y)*(m.sin(q1)*m.cos(q3) - m.sin(q2)*m.sin(q3)*m.cos(q1))
66 
67  # Create matrix
68  j = np.zeros((3, 3), dtype=float)
69 
70  j[0][0] = x_q1
71  j[0][1] = x_q2
72  j[0][2] = x_q3
73 
74  j[1][0] = y_q1
75  j[1][1] = y_q2
76  j[1][2] = y_q3
77 
78  j[2][0] = z_q1
79  j[2][1] = z_q2
80  j[2][2] = z_q3
81 
82  # rospy.loginfo("Jacobienne")
83  # rospy.loginfo(j[0])
84  # rospy.loginfo(j[1])
85  # rospy.loginfo(j[2])
86 
87  # rospy.loginfo("Déterminant de la jacobienne = %f", det(j))
88 
89  try:
90  if det(j) != 0:
91  resp.velocities = np.matmul(inv(j), command)
92  resp.velocities[0] *= (45/14)
93  resp.velocities[1] *= (30/14)/2
94  resp.velocities[2] *= 32/24
95  resp.singularMatrix = 0
96  else:
97  rospy.logerr("Can't create inverse matrix, jacobian determinant is %f", det(j))
98  # rospy.logerr("Jog in joint to a less critical position")
99  resp.velocities = [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]
100  resp.singularMatrix = 1
101 
102  except:
103  rospy.logerr("Singular matrix : encountered a column of 0 (can't divide by 0)")
104  # rospy.logerr("Jog in joint to a less critical position")
105  resp.velocities = [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]
106  resp.singularMatrix = 1
107 
108  rospy.loginfo("-------------------------")
109  rospy.loginfo("Velocities: {}".format(resp.velocities))
110  rospy.loginfo("Singular Matrix: {}".format(resp.singularMatrix))
111  rospy.loginfo("--------------------------------------------------")
112 
113  return resp
114 
115 def inv_kin_calc_service():
116  rospy.init_node("inv_kin_calc_service", anonymous=True, log_level=rospy.INFO)
117  s = rospy.Service('inverse_kinematic_calc_service', InverseKinematicCalc, handle_inv_kin_calc)
118  rospy.loginfo("Service initialized")
119  rospy.spin()
120 
121 if __name__=='__main__':
122  inv_kin_calc_service()
